name: Speed Cyclist Impossible
description:
Speed Cyclist Impossible is extreme enthusiast of bicycle stunt adventures and challenging races. While reaching towards the destination wearing no jersey, our bicycle adventure cyclist shows great stamina and force paddling towards the goal. Overtake the opponents with grace and win the races with the big heart and stamina of a horse. Superhero flying stunts racing Bicycle rider. MTB rider cycle race downhill challenge to racing opponents in the game. Sunny and fog conditions making the game a more fun and challenging to win. Dangerous tracks for BMX bicycle Jump stunting racers is blessing. Competitor cyclists looking for joyful competition here on the slippery racing tracks.
Features:
- BMX Freestyle passion racing
- Pedal your BMX for extreme riding
- Nitro Pickups For Boost Up
- Speed Variants
- Easy Controls For BMX Moto
- Extreme BMX Bicycle Physics
- Stunning Graphics
- Ride Your BMX Bike As.
